feed.title: The 34th Meeting of Computational Linguistics in The Netherlands

entry.title: GPT-NL: Announcing Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO as keynote speakers

link.title: GPT-NL: Announcing Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO as keynote speakers

entry.content: We are happy to announce that Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO will host a keynote at CLIN 34 regarding GPT-NL!
entry.summary: Dominique Blok and Erik de Graaf from TNO will host a keynote regarding GPT-NL at CLIN 34!

entry.title: Announcing Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker

link.title: Announcing Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker

entry.content: We are happy to announce Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker for CLIN 34!
entry.summary: We are happy to announce Diana Maynard as a keynote speaker for CLIN 34!

entry.title: Call for abstracts
entry.content:
Abstracts describing work on any aspect of computational linguistics / natural language processing (finished or in progress), are welcome for submission at CLIN34. Submissions must be written in English, adhere to the 500 word limit, and must be submitted through this web form. Please provide all information requested in the form.

The submission deadline is May 22nd 2024 and notifications of acceptance will be sent out on June 22nd 2024. Authors of accepted abstracts will have the opportunity to submit a full paper after the conference to CLIN Journal.
entry.summary: Abstract submission for CLIN34 is now open! Click here for more information.
